title: Public Holidays of Malaysia - Kuala Lumpur
about: Public Holidays of Malaysia - Kuala Lumpur

gregorian: New Years Day, All regions except Johor, Kedah, Kelantan, Perlis, Terengganu
Public Holiday as New Years Day of 2017 falls on a Sunday
1st Saturday of June, Birthday of SPB Yang di Pertuan Agong (National Holiday)
Hijri: */01/01, Awal Muharram (Islamic New Year) (National Holiday)
All regions except Johor, Kedah, Malacca, Negeri Sembilan, Sabah, Sarawak
Hijri: */10/01, Hari Raya Aidilfitri (Eid Al-Fitr) (National Holiday)
Hijri: */10/02, Second day of holiday for Hari Raya Aidilfitri (Eid Al-Fitr)
Hijri: */12/10, Hari Raya Haji (Festival of Sacrifice) (National Holiday)
Chinese New Year 2nd day (LUNAR), All regions except Terengganu
Wesak Day (National Holiday)(LUNAR, Hindu calendar, Ovserved)
